    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Explosion de supernova</string>
            <string language="en">Supernova explosion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Supernovaexplosion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explosão do supernova</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplosione del supernova</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έκρηξη σουπερνοβών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explosión de la supernova</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que quand la masse du  géant rouge est 3 fois la masse du soleil, une explosion de supernova se produit et une étoile de neutrons peut être laissé derrière elles.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that when the mass of the red giant is 3 times the mass of the Sun, a supernova explosion occurs and a neutron star maybe left behind.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">masse</string>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile de neutrons</string>
            <string language="en">neutron stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">géant rouge</string>
            <string language="en">red giant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">explosion de supernova</string>
            <string language="en">supernova explosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn die Masse des 
roten Riesen 3 mal die Masse der Sonne ist, eine Supernovaexplosion 
und ein Neutronstern möglicherweise nach links nach auftritt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que quando a massa do 
gigante vermelho é 3 vezes a massa do sol, uma explosão do supernova
ocorre e uma estrela de nêutron talvez à esquerda atrás.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che quando la massa 
del gigante rosso è 3 volte la massa del sole, un'esplosione del 
supernova accade e una stella di neutrone forse a sinistra dietro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν η μάζα του 
κόκκινου γίγαντα είναι 3 φορές η μάζα του ήλιου, μια έκρηξη 
σουπερνοβών εμφανίζεται και ένα αστέρι νετρονίων ίσως αριστερά 
πίσω από.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que cuando la masa del 
gigante rojo es 3 por la masa del sol, ocurre una explosión de la 
supernova y una estrella de neutrón quizá a la izquierda detrás.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutronsterne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">roter Riese</string>
          </keyword>
